25a1: zung ste/ gnas rnga lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang / sems can rnams kyis/ 'di ltar bdag cag yul gang du bkod pa dang / bdag cag yul gang nas bton pa yang ma 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
25a2: 'das de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/ / 'di na cho 'phrul chen po dang gas te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa dang / bsnyad dam
25a3: mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du gyur te/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bral ba dang / tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang / zhi ba dang byang
25a4: ba dang / phra ba dang / mthong bar dka' ba dang / brtag tu ma mchis pa dang / rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang /
25a5: brdadang / tha snyad kyi lam de dang / de dag gis chos de snyan pa de yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i
25a6: 'phrul de dag thams cad ni/ mtshan ma'i dngos po dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad pa lags so// 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po logs ste// 'di lta ste/
25a7: bdag ma mchis pa la/ bdag du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la/ sems can du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / srog ma mchis pa la srog du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gsob ma mchis pa lags
25a8: bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed las skyes pa ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / shed bu ma mchim pa la shed bur tha snyad 'dogs
25b1: gas dang/ @/ las na
25b2: snyad 'dogs pa dang / 'du byed napa ma mchis pa la 'du byed rnams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes par tha skad du 'dogs pa dang / phung po ma mchis pa la phung por tha skad 'dags pa/
25b3: dang / khams ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / skye mched ma mchis pa la bye mched du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang / mig s+ho shes kyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa
25b4: dang / gzugs stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / gzugs ni 'di snyam du bdag stong do snyam du mi sems pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'di
25b5: snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce dang ro dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus dang reg bya dang / lus kyi
25b6: rnam par shes pa dang / yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo ngo/ zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag
25b7: stong do snyam du mi sems pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du/ bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems te/ 'di ltar bems po dang / sems pa ma mchis pa/
25b8: dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / ming ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag/ sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan dag dang / yang dag par go bar mdzad pa/ gang lags pa/
26a1: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ gzugs dang ldan par yang ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma
26a2: lags/ rna ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sgra dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ dri dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa/
26a3: yang ma lags/ lce dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ ro dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ reg bya dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes
26a4: pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags te// de lta bu'i cho 'phrul de ni yul ma mchis pa'i cho 'phrul las
26a5: so/ / de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par lta ba ma lags/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang ldan par blta ba ma lags te// de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni/ 'jig rten thams
26a6: cad glo ba mi ches par 'byung ba lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/ phung po lnga po mi rtag pa de la/ byis pa rnams mngon par zhen cing / de dag gis phung po lnga po dag/
26a7: rtag par bzung ba'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni/ 'jig rten thams cad slob mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lngapo dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na/ de dag mi rtag go zhes bshad na/
26a8: 'jig rten thams cad slob mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo ches pas na/ de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na/ 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi che lags so// 'jig rten
26b1: niphung po lnga po dag/ bdag ces bgyi bar grob ches pas na/ de dag bdag ma mchis so shes bgadan/ 'jig rten thams cad slob mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag sdug ces bgyi bar grob ches pas//
26b2: de dag mi sdug go zhes bsha na/ 'jig rten thams cad thob mi ches lags so// 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar thob ches pas na/ de dag bdag po ma mchis so zhes bag dan/ 'jig rten
26b3: thams cad slob mi ches lags so/ / 'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag pa zhes bgyi bar thob ches pas na/ de dag yang dag pa ma lags so// shes bgad na 'jig rten thams cad slob ma ches lags te/
26b4: de ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'brul de ni/ 'jig rten thams cad slob mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so// cho 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags ste// cho 'phrul de ni bsam gyis mi
26b5: khyab pa lags so/ / cho 'phrul de ni mig tu bgrang ba ma lags/ gzugs su bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni mig dang / gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// cho 'phrul de ni
26b6: rna bar bgrang ba ma lags/ sngar bgrang ba ma lags te/ cho 'bul de ni rna ba dang / sgra'i yul wa yang dag par 'das pa lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid du bgrang ba ma lags// chos su bzang
26b7: bam lags te/ cho 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so// cho 'phrul don shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags/ rangs par bgyid pa ma lags te/ cho 'phrul don rnam par rig par ba
26b8: bam lags so/ / stong pa nyid na bdod dum mchis pa lags// stong pa nyid rjod pa den tshe 'bul lags so// tsan ma mchis pani dod dum mchis pa lags// mag ya sa bdod pa don
27a1: lags so/ / smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ smon pa ma mchis brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lag so// mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa
27a2: lags na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ skye ba ma mchis brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'byung ba ma
27a3: mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung ba ma mchis brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// dngos po ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ dngos po ma mchis brjod pa de ni ro 'phrul
27a4: lags so/ / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'gag pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ 'gag
27a5: ma mchis brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ mya ngan las 'das brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ bdag du dmigs pa ma mchis
27a6: pa dang / sems can du kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / byang chub la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ lus g.yo ba ma mchis
27a7: pa dang / ngag rjod pa ma mchis pa dang / sems rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang /
27a8: sems skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i de ni cho 'phrul lags so// 'di lta ste/ blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa
27b1: dag gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus don tshe 'phrul lags so/ / 'di las/ na nya ba na pa dang / phyi rol du tu bamamachis pa dang / sems bsam pa' ma
27b2: mam sas su dag pa'i bams gtan na tsho 'phrul lags sa/ / 'di sa ste/ rang dzin pa rnas par spangs padang / mi dzin bapor bdang / pa rnam thathamasapa da dang tham pa' 'ab gsas
27b3: sa dag pa'i shes rab de ni tshe 'phrul lags sa/ / chos thams cad ni rnam par thal ma mchis pa lags na/ ded/ rnam par thal bar bag pani 'phrul lags so// chos thams padan dngas thams
27b4: pa lags na/ rang gi ngo bo dang bral bar bshad pa deni tshe 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/ ye shes kun tu bye ba ste/ bshad pa ni co 'phrul lags so// chos thams cadan
27b5: 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na/ 'byung bar bshad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags so/
27b6: chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs pa cig pa lags na/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni ro cig pa lags na/ theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni tshe
27b7: 'phrul lags so/ / chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/ chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig pa lags na/ sangs rgyas
27b8: dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/ / zhing thams cad ni zhing gcig pa la gas na/ zhing sna tshogs bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig pa lags na//
28a1: sems can gyi rim pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na/ tha ma dang mchog dang bar mar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par
28a2: bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ rnam par sgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni tshe 'phrul lags so// chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na/ gzhan la rnam par rig pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul chen po'o//
28a3: de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa/ ltar na/ ji tsam du brjod pa de dag thams cad
28a4: nicho 'phrul yin no/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin pas/ de dag la rjod pa gang yin pa de ni
28a5: 'phrul chen po yin no/ / bstan pa 'di bshad pa ni/ lha'i nyi wa stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyan me skye ba chos la bzod pa thob pa
28a6: gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad smras so// lha'i bu ci khyod cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
28a7: bu kho bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin no/ / de la kho bo skrag par 'gyur du ci yod// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/ lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams
28a8: cad 'pho ba med pa yin no/ de la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni tshe 'phrul chen po yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis/ kho bo lnga rnam kyi nang du
28b1: skyes te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yang / thob pa'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems par mi byed cing / rnam par shes par mi byed do// de u0f7f/ bas na sems can thams
28b2: cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yang sems par mi byed cing / rnam par shes par mi byed de/ sems par mi byed cing / rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa don tshe 'phrul chen po yin to// bcom ldan 'das
28b3: kyis de skad dus rnam kyilas kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / grwa rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis ma khya
28b4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / zhes gsungs pa lta ba te/ de lta bas na chos thams da// bsab kyi mi khyabab ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pagang
28b5: yin pa de ni cho 'brul chen po yin no/ / yang gnas pa nyid sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'di skad du lha'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de ni thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram/ zhes zer ba de ni/
28b6: btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci de bzhin gshegs pas tsha 'phral bstan pa gang yin pa des/ nam mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/ smras pa lha'i bu de ni ma yin na// smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te de
28b7: bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des/ nam mkha' khabs skrag par mi 'gyur na/ kho bo yang grag par mi 'gyur ro// smras pa lha'i ci khyod nam mkha' yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ kha bonan pa
28b8: mkha' yin no/ / smras pa lha'i bu khyod ci las bsam te/ de skad smra/ smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis/ nang gi nam mkha' khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / phyi rol gyi nam mkha' khams su
29a1: gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams ma yin nam/ smras pa lha'i bu de ni yin no// smras pa btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin can
29a2: yin no/ / smras pa lha'i bu/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod nyid kyang ring po ma thogs par cho 'phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// smras pa btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ cho 'phrul de dag ni nye bar bstan par/
29a3: mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tsha 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/
29a4: lha'i bu ded dpon 'di de lta bu ston pa las ni/ 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing/ 'jam dpal gzhon nung gyur pa la 'di bsnyen bkur bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba/
29a5: shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
29a6: bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bskal pa mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
29a7: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu'i 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
29a8: ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de yang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par
29b1: gnas shing sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam med la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang / rin po che sna bzhi/ gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las grub cing lagam thil ltar mnyam
29b2: la/ ka tsa lin de 'gos ltang rag na/ 'jam zhing ma khom pa dang / ngan song nams dang bral la/ lha dang mi rnams kyi kun tu gang zhing / yid la bsam pa tsam gyis/ gza' ba dang / btud bdag 'byor la/
29b3: bde 'tshad med pa dang ldan pas na/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi 'ams de bde ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun na// byang chub sams dpa' 'a ba' sheg ste/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ shes rab tu
29b4: snang ba thob pa/ gzung dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa/ spobs pa mchod pa/ tshig thams cad rab du 'byed cing / ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pas/ rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/ bdud
29b5: dad phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sa sra can tham cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rig pa bzhin du/ chos kyi sman sbyor ba la pa'as /
29b6: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ gsol bam btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi shing thams cad du 'gro ba shes pa la
29b7: mkhas pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang / rtog pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang / brtan pa dang blo rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / zos pa dang shes rab la
29b8: shin tu mkhas pa/ thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la/ lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu zhugs pa
30a1: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas/ rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom
30a2: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal
30a3: po gling bzhi'i dbang phyug rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/ mi'i dbang por gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te// de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang
30a4: dag par zhugs pa sha stag go/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de yang / btsun mo'i tshogs rnams dang / lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur
30a5: to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe tshad dang / mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni/ lo dung phyur phrag bdun thub par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dge
30a6: ba'i bkod pa bu stong dang lhan cig/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu/ chos la dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
30a7: pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la/ lo 'bum tshad par thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du/ na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gyi
30a8: gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so// rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas/ rtag par rgyun tu de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon sum du
30b1: nyan cigam 'chad par rang ga la gnas gus par bral zhing / rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par chos nyan pa la yang 'jug par gyur to// de bu dang bcas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas/ lo 'bras 'das nas kyang
30b2: yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong zhing / yang dang yang du de la chos nyan pas rjes su dran pa bani thob par gyur to// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes
30b3: su dran pa dang / sbyin pa dang ldan zhing / byang chub kyi sems mi brjod pa'i tshul khrims nges su dran pa ste/ rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to// de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pas nyin mtshan
30b4: du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos yang dag par 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang bral bar ma gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa/ bu dang bcas btsun mo'o//
30b5: 'khor dang bcas pa de/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs
30b6: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la/ cho 'phrul rnam pa du mas rdzas su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
30b7: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan/
30b8: mchis lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de la/ 'di skad ces
31a1: bka' stsal to/ / rgyal po chen po cho 'phrul de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do// de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sems dang sems las byung ba/ gzugs can ma yin pa rnams
31a2: bshad pa dang / sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang / ma skyes mabyung ba'i lam bgad pa dang / rnam par
31a3: thar pa'i sgo gshe ba rnams la/ yan lag gsum du smos pa dang / mngon par rtog pagazhe tu 'dus pa la/ bden pa bzhing yongs su brjod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i
31a4: byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang / phyin ci log dang nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par
31a5: byed pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa
31a6: dang 'byung ba med cing skad cig pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / lus dang sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs
31a7: pamed pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / pha rol dang tshur rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / rtag pa dang / bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la
31a8: thabs la mkhas pa yod pa dang / skyob pa med pa dang / rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa bsgom pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rje sbyor ba dang / dga' ba med pa'i chos
31b1: rnams la dga' ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms bsgom pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang / thos pa med
31b2: pa dang / rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang / dmigs pa de/ sems dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang
31b3: bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yod pa dang / sems dang lus dang sgra dang / brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang / gnas med pa'i chos rnams
31b4: la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa dang / dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang / stobs med pa dang /
31b5: nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs yongs su rjod pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang / khyang bar med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang / zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos
31b6: rnams la zhi gnas skyed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa smos pa'o//
31b7: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang / bu stong pa de dag dang / btsun mi'i tshogs de dag la tshe
31b8: 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//
32a1: nga/ mas 'angs sa la ra thAg// sa pa das u0f7fsa da sa ma
32a2: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni// srun pa'i rgyal ba
32a3: mdzes pa ltar/ / de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni// chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes// ji lta nyi ma'i 'char ba yis// mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar// de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzod snga yang // sangs rgyas zhing rnam
32a4: snang bar bgyid/ / ji ltar zla ba nya ba yi// zla ba yongs rdzogs lha de ltar// sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yis// 'jig rten mgon yang lha de lags// ji ltar me tog pad ma ni// chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar//
32a5: de bzhin 'jig rten mgon po yang // 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags// ji ltar seng ge ri dgas rgyal// nags na sgra skad sgrogs pa ltar// de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang // stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrogs// mchis
32a6: sam yang nam mchis dang / / mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang // mthar lta ba las rnam 'das pas// nges par sang ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skya ba 'am yang na 'jigs pa'ang rung // de dag mtshan mar bstan mdzad cing /
32a7: mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa// nges par seng ge sgra zhes bgyid// pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag/ de dag rnam par rtog par bstan// chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// kun nas nyon mongs
32a8: rnams byang ba/ / de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te// shin tu dri ma ma mchis chos// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni// yongs su rtogs las byung ba ste// rtog bral rnam rtog ma mchis pa/
32b1: denges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// de dag lam du zhugs pa ste// chos rnams shin tu gsags lags pa// nges pa seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// skye dang 'chi dang 'khor ba ni// byin ci leg las byung
32b2: bste/ mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med don// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// lha dang dmigs pa gnas lags te// de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug/ chos rnams stong par rab bshad pa// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi//
32b3: 'jig rten mgon po'i cho 'phrul ni// gang dag ji snyed bstan mdzad pa// de dag thams cad bshad pa ni// nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi// sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du// rjes su 'thun dang mi 'thun pa'i// gang la'
32b4: sems ni mi 'jug pa/ / de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'i// zab cing zhil 'thun bgyid cing // de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// mi dge thams cad ma gtogs par//
32b5: dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing // de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// spyod pa'i sgra dang sems can sla// de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni// sgrarnams kun la ma chags pa// de ni rjes 'thun
32b6: bzod pa lag/ sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra// rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang // gang gi sgra la'ang mi rtog pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes
32b7: rab dang / / de bzhin kun la brtson bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lag// thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing // byang chub sems ni mi spong la// byang chub lam ni ston bgyid pa// de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa
32b8: lags/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la// de 'dra'i chos ni bstan mdzad// de la sa mnyi ma mchis pa// den rjes 'thun bzod pa lags// bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing // seng gi skam
33a1: bsgrags nas ni/ / ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i// cho 'phrul nges par bstan par bgyi// zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste// bla med bsod nams zhing de la// bdag gis sa bon pa
33a2: pas na/ / bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags// dogs pa thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho'ang bas par 'gyur ganga' yi// rdzogs sangs rgyas la sbran pa yi// sa bon nams kyang chab mi 'tshal//
33a3: sems can rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing // nam mkha' gzhal bar rdo thog gi// byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems// de yi bsod nams tshad ma mchis// bdag gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba'i// dpung du lha dang dri za dang /
33a4: mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te// bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag gi dbang // 'dren pa dag ni longs spyod dang // gzugs dang mtho'i ris mi 'tshal gyi// mi mchog khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni// ji 'dra de ltar bdag gyur
33a5: cig byang chub la ni dmigs bgyis nas/ / bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni// ma chags sdang ba ma mchis par// bdag gri bde gsheg bsten bkur bgyis// bdag gi byis pa stong rnams dang / mchis phrad yongasu smin bgyis pa/
33a6: lawa 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub slad du spro bar mdzod/ bdag gis bde gshegs legs par mthong // chos 'di legs par thos pa dang // byang chub la ni rtag dga' dang // bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang
33a7: zhig byang chub dga' bgyis pa/ / de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'// chos rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa// sems can kun la rtag dga' lags// de nas 'khor de nyid du chos spa ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya
33a8: bzhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang / 'thun par ma byas kyi mi 'thun par byas pas na/
33b1: khyod na gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshor ba thams cad med pas
33b2: shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs pa med cing bor ba med pas/ blang ba med la/ do ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam mkha' la bris pa dang / 'dra' bas gzugs med
33b3: pa/ kha dog med pa/ rtags med pa/ dbyibs med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas/ gnyen po med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos tham cad dang mnyam pas/ thams
33b4: cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad bral bas/ g.yo ba med pa yin no// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o// rgyal po chen po
33b5: byang chub ni rtag pa dang / bsal ba dang / bral bas nye bar zhi ba'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mi 'thun pa med pas/ lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongs su grub pa med pas/ sems
33b6: mnyam pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas// sems can dang mtshungs pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas/ skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o// /
33b7: rgyal po chen po byang chub ni sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral bas/ rnam par rig pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas/ rgyu ba med pa'o// rgyal
33b8: po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad bral
34a1: pas mtshan ma med pa'o/ / rgyal po chen po byang chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o// rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o//
34a2: rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral bas/ 'dus ma byas pa ste// rgyal po chen po gang dag sa chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang / ngo ba nyid du lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang / gang dag smon lam
34a3: 'debs par byed pa dang / gang dag mang dpang dga' bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ lag par rtsol ba yin no// kyi'i phyir nen/ rgyal po chen pa byang chub ci 'dra ba/
34a4: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang de 'dra ba yin pas na// gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
34a5: 'phags pa po 'phrul min po brtan pa zhes byab na paro// / denas rgyal bdag pa'i bag pas/ chos smra 'dag slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'dis
34a6: smras so/ / rigs kyi ba khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la thobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / chos smraba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ rgyal po dge
34a7: bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rnams sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ bdog pa tha ma cad yongs su gtong bar spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
34a8: ba yin no/ / tshul khrims kyis rloms sems su mi byed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang / slab pa dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
34b1: spyod pa yin no/ / bzod pas rloms sems su mi byed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis 'thab dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / 'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba dang /
34b2: thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// brtson 'grus kyis rloms sems su mi byed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing / 'bang ba dang / #
34b3: med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / bsam gtan gyis rloms sems su mi byed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
34b4: 'jug pa bsgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / shes rab kyi rloms sems su mi byed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni/ byang chub sems
34b5: dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / gnyis dang bral ba'i btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis/ tshangs pa'i gnas bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mngon par shes pas rlom sems
34b6: su mi byed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa skyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dang chos la nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa
34b7: la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yin no// yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sem
34b8: kyis nges par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don 'thun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdus pa'i dngos po
35a1: bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la/ sems mnyam pa/
35a2: nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed
35a3: pani/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
35a4: kyi stong ba yin no/ / lus dang ngag dang / sems mnyam pa nyid kyis/ lus dang ngag dang sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can thams cad pa/ bdag med par mnyam pa tid
35a5: kyis sems can thams cad la ci zhig bya ba snyam du spro ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur mos pas mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongs su mi spyo ni byang chub sems
35a6: dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la/ mos pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// chos sgyu ma lta bu
35a7: so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul thugs dang / dka' thub kyi ga cha bgos pani/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin to// thug bsngal ste ba med par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad
35a8: bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/ / mdza' ba shes dang / mdza ba shes ma yin pa la/ sams snyoms pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba brtan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// lan re ba
35b1: med pa panyam pa nyid kyag/ lhag pa bsam pa la snang ban/ byang chub sems dpa' nas bya spyad pa sanan/ zas pa dang sgrub pa panyas pa nyid byas/ sa pargyam tham sa dmas pani/ byang chub sems dpa rnams/
35b2: kyi spyod pa yin no// zang zi med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ chos la slobs dpon gyi dpe mthudang med pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yin no// chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ dam pa'i chos yongs
35b3: su 'din pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// don dam pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid kyi/ bden pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// sems can
35b4: la shin tu 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ nga rgyal nges par bcom pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas/ rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/
35b5: yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba'i yongs su tshol ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i dkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa
35b6: de dag thos nas/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ gos dang / rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis/ chos smra ba'i dge slong / chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par
35b7: bkab po/ / bstong po de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi rgyan dag gis/ chos smra ba'i dge slong / chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas/ tshig 'di skad du/ gang bdag cag gis/ skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu lta ba dang / phyag bya
35b8: ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni/ bdag cag gi rnyed pa legs par rnye do// sems can thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang / spobs pa de lta bu dag thos par gyur cig ces kyang smras so// /
36a1: de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/ rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gos dang rgyan tsam gyis/ mchod pa de ni mchod pa chen
36a2: po ma yin gyis/ de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis/ de dag khyod kyis sgrubs shig/ de yang gang zhe na/ de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis/
36a3: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun// byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing // ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni// bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa zhes/
36a4: gang dag byang chub phyir ni sems skyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slab pa dang // rab 'byung sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba// de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang dag sngon chad byung
36a5: ba'i sangs rgyas dang / / gang dag ma byon 'byung dang bzhugs pa dang // de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par// bla med byang chub zhib thob pa med// rang 'byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rab tu bstod
36a6: cing bsngags la bkur ba ste/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa// rgyal ba'i bstan la rab 'byung gzung bar gyis// gang zhig khyim gan+da rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i// gang gi'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin
36a7: dang / gang zhig rab byung nyin dang mtshan gcig tu/ mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na// gang zhig rang byung bag yod gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang // bdud kyi dkyil 'khor
36a8: shin tu bcom byas shing / / dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin// rang 'byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang // lam gyi rjes 'thun 'phags pa'i skye bo stong// de ni dge ba chud za ma yin zhing // de ni yongs
36b1: su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin/ / byes las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing // nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med// nam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod// spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed med/ la/
36b2: de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / longs spyod dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la mi blta bar gyur cing // skye la 'dod chags dang bral ba skyes
36b3: par gyur te/ / rab tu byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i rab lta bu la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la
36b4: rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa/ dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rab tu byung ba ni/ dgag pa med pa ste/
36b5: sems can thams la sang dbang du migacod cing skabs yod do// khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis/ gal te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su bstan gyis/ khyed kyis kyang gdams shing rjes/
36b6: su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang / rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas/ bu stong po de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag las rgyal srid sgrub pa dang sems
36b7: can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par spo ba su yod/ de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ yab bdag cag kyang dad pas/ khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyis/ bdag cag mi
36b8: der bar gsol/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te byed cag thams cad rab tu byung na/ gling bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyis/ khyed cag las gang
37a1: sems can rnams la btan pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des/ rgyal srid klubs la sems can nams chos yang dag par 'dzin du chug shig/ de nas rgyal bu gzhozhan nu de dag ga nang
37a2: nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya ba des/ rang gi pa de dang / rgan rabs de dag la/ tshigs su bcad pade smras pa// rang 'brung yon tan du ma bsags pa zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
37a3: kyis gsungs mod kyi/ / de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na// 'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub// ji srid 'tsho bar bdag gi tshangs spyod cing // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi/
37a4: me tog rnams dang dri dang thug pa dang // de bzhin char yang myang bar mi bgyi'o// lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi thogs shing // mchil lham mi 'tshal rin chen gtsug phud min// khri rkang gser las bgyis par mi
37a5: nyal zhing / / rgyal po'i rkyen kyi gos kyang mi 'tshal lo// sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing // cha bya dad pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi bgyid// skye bos mdun ba dar bud med gnas spong zhing // gcig pu ma la na/
37a6: mchis nyal rlung mi g.yab/ bdag ni gling nA gling du mchis bgyi zhing // dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi// khyi man gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing // rab tu 'byung ba'i sngags pa'ang brjod par
37a7: bgyi/ gzugs dang longs spyod dbang phyug dregs pa yis// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi// byang chub sems ni bskud par mi bgyi zhing // rtag tu yi byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi/
37a8: byin dang snyan spa don spyod don 'thun pas// sems can bsrub la ni brtson pagyi zhing // thasad theg chen dam pa'i da la yang // srog chags bye ba mang po yangs smin bgyi// ches don mnyan cing bshad par bgyi
37b1: ska du nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du/ / ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchog// de bzhin gshegs pa la na mchod pa'ang kri// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par rabal bas/
37b2: rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems la/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa lags so// legs so// bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na/ khyim par
37b3: gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba dang yon tan mtshungs pa yin no/ / khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na/ rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bsgrub par yang bsgrub par byed pa yin no// de nas rgyal po dge ba'i
37b4: bkod pas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyang / rgyal srid la gzhag nas/ bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung bar
37b5: gyur to/ / de dag rab tu byung nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa des/ cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis/ de lta de ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan pas/ de dag gis ring po mi thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga skyed
37b6: par gyur to/ / gzungs dang dran pa dang / chos nyan pa'i shes pa yang bskyed par gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyang / rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas/ zla ba nya'o cog na gling chen po bzhi po dag tu rjes
37b7: su ston par byed de/ / ci nas kyang srog chags dud phyur phrag dgu dang / bye ba phrag gnyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston
37b8: par gyur to/ / de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de'i bstan pa la dad pas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ theg pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag
38a1: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir me ldog pa sha sdug tu gyur to/ / shar dwa ti'i bu ji tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su spyad pa byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur cing /
38a2: dad pa skyes par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos/ dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang / yid
38a3: gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha radwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ lha'i buded dpon 'di nyid/ de'i tshe de'i duman/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to// shar dwa ti'i bu
38a4: de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod/ som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/
38a5: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i bu stong thab par
38a6: gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du/ khyod som nyi dang / yid gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas stong po dag/ de'i tshe de'i
38a7: dus na/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du/ khyod som nyi dang yid
38a8: gnyis za bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya bar gyur to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag
38b1: yod pa rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / shes bzhin gyi spyod pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di
38b2: bgadan/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las/ srog chags sum khri nyis stong than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus// 'jam dpal gnon
38b3: nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang / lhan cig tu yun ring po gnas/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing / dge ba'irtsa
38b4: ba bskyed pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig bla dgas yin la/ lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi// kho bo
38b5: ni 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yin pas/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/ kho bo ni spyod pa
38b6: med pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas/ tshangs pa spyad pa yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni gnyis su sbyor ba yang
38b7: ma yin la/ gnyis su med par sbyor ba yang ma yin te// de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/
38b8: kho bo ni gnyen pos rab tu bye ba ma yin te// de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
39a1: las 'byol ba yin gyis/ kho bo ni gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang rodang / reg bya dang / chos las 'byol bam yin te// de'i byar lo ba ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa shar
39a2: dwa ti'i bu/ tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma
39a3: yin no/ / btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/ kho bo ni dge ba dang / sdig pa la nges par sbyor bar mi byed de/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas/ tshangs
39a4: bar spyad pa ma yin no/ / btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thos pa yin gyi/ kho bo ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pam
39a5: yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/ kho bo ni 'asngo ba las 'byol ba ma yin te/ de'i phyir kho bo
39a6: ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ / btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes pa de ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi kho bo ni mya ngan las 'da' ba don du gnyer ba ma yin te de'i phyi la
39a7: po ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/ / btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ 'jam dpal khyod ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i
39a8: bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni snyen bkur bya bar mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med cing / bstan tu med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni
39b1: tshor ba med cing / tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing / 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas/
39b2: de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing / 'dus ma byas brnyes pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par
39b3: shes pa med cing / yid gnas pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing // stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin pas de la
39b4: bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rna ba dang / sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i ma yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i
39b5: yul ma yin zhing / gnyis dang bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang re'i yul ma yin zhing / rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de la
39b6: bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing / thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni
39b7: yid dang chos kyi yul ma yin zhing / chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen
39b8: bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'thun par zhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
40a1: yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la bzhugs pa yang yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni/
40a2: rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin
40a3: gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la bzhugs pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya
40a4: bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya
40a5: bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang / 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la snyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi zhing rab du zhi la/ nye bar zhi ba yin/
40a6: pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang / bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dog dang gzugs
40a7: dang dbyibs dang / bral ba yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du ma smad cing / kha na ma tho ba med pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /
40a8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la/ yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang // btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du skur ba gangab du
40b1: med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas/ de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// zhes
40b2: zer ba la/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jigs tshogs rtsab ma yin pa dang / ma reg pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa rtsab ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang ti mug rtsab ma yin pa dang / byin ci log pan
40b3: rtsab ma yin pa dang / phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsab ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / log pa brgyad rtsab ma yin pa dang / kun mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu
40b4: pam yin pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsub ma yin pa dang / mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsab ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bgrod pa cig pa'i lam la/ mngon par
40b5: zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyis bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas/ rlom
40b6: sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / dbang po lngar 'du shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi
40b7: yan lag bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas/ rlom sems su byed pa rtsab ma yin pa dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta bskyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa/
40b8: dang / mi slob pa'i chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa
41a1: dang / lha'i bu'i bdud rtsab ma yin pa gang yin pa den dge ba'i rtsa la yin no// sgrib brtsab ma yin pa dang / rgod pa dang / kun nas ldang brtsab ma yin pa dang / 'gyod parlab ma yin pa gang yin pa de na
41a2: dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / bdag tu lta brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / gso ba dang / gang zag du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no//
41a3: 'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / chad par lta brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta bca ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// tshul bzhin ma yin brtsab ma yin pa
41a4: dang / ma rig partsa ba ma yin pa dang / 'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par rig brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye mched drug rtsab ma yin pa dang / reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / tshor brtsabs
41a5: yin pa dang / sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / len pa'i rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang / skye brtsa ba ma yin pa dang / rgashi rtsa pa ma yin pa dang / nad dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ca
41a6: ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / 'dod pa'i khams rtsab ma yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams rtsab ma yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams cab ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin na/
41a7: sbyin pas rlom sems su byed bcub ma yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rlos sems su byed pacab ma yin pa gang yin pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yinan/
41a8: byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba gang yin pa den
41b1: byang chub sams dpa'i dge pa'an ba yin na byams pa dang skang rdza ldan pa'i rtsa ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs
41b2: su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang / brgya byin dang /
41b3: tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i yang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang / bzod pa dang / zhi ba dang dul ba dang / nges pa'i rtsa ba dang / bdag dang gzhan la mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang / brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po'i rtsom pa'i
41b4: rtsa ba dang / dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang / bsam gtan gyi ro med par mi byed pa'i rtsa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang / btang snyoms kyang ma yin pa'i rtsa ba dang /
41b5: thabs kyi rtsa ba dang / thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rkun mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang / skabs bcu dang mi
41b6: 'jigs pa bzhi'i rtsa ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// lus dang ngag dang / sems kyi rgyun gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa
41b7: de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// spobs pa mi chod pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub
41b8: sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/ / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba
42a1: gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang / lan sum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa
42a2: bcu gnyis su skor ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na/
42a3: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis
42a4: mngon par gtor nas/ tshig 'di skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba gnas pa der ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnyid byung ba yin par rig par bya'o// sems can gang dag 'jam
42a5: dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin//
42a6: de ni theg pa chen po 'di la snang ba thob pa yin no// zhes kyang smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des smras pa la rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad nas/ lha'i bu ded dpon
42a7: la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bshad pa de thos nas/ mos par 'gyur ba de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin te// de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i tshe 'phrul
42a8: rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ / deci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di la ste rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par bgad pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa rnams pa/ sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang /
42b1: bdag tu shes pa rnams la/ bdag med par bshad pa dang / sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang / dngos por 'dugs pa rnams la/ dngos po med par bshad pa dang / lta bar 'du shes pa
42b2: nams la/ stong par bshad pa dang / mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnams la/ mtshan pa med par bshad pa dang / khams gsum par 'dugs pa rnams la/ smon pa med par bgad pa dang / rang dzin pa dang/
42b3: 'dzin par 'dushes pa rnams la/ lba ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te/ gang dag de la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag na yang dag par dul ba yin pas na/ yang
42b4: dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la yang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ rarang 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de
42b5: dag des yongs su ma bzung bas/ yongs su ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang / rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa la 'gul ba med pa dang / 'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang / blang ba med pa la dor
42b6: ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang / 'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la/ phyin ci log med pa dang / phyin ci log med pa la/ log pa nyid med pa dang
42b7: log pa nyid dang bral ba ni/ yang dag par sgrub pa yin pa dang / yang dag par sgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi bar dag yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge
42b8: 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / sems rnam par mi ga yeng ba la/ gnas pa med pa dang / sems mi gnas pa la gnas pa med pa dang / sems kyi gnas med pa la/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa
43a1: dang / rnam par rig pa med pa la/ brtag cing stsal pa med pa dang / brtag cing stsal pa dang bral bas/ dmigs pa spangs pa dang / dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang / sgrib pa
43a2: med par gnas pa la/ rlom sems med pa dang / gang gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe/ lhag par rlom pa med pa dang / gang gi tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa de'i tshe/ bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang / med pa la
43a3: yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa la/ sgyid lug pa med pa dang / sgyid lug pa med pa la/ nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems la gsal ba snang ba dang / gsal ba
43a4: thob pas ye shes mthong ba dang / ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang / sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par
43a5: bcom pa la/ sgrib pa med pa'i mngon du 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon tu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing / skye ba med pa'i chos rnams
43a6: la chos kyi go rims kyi mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang / tshe 'phrul chen po yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag
43a7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ci dang ci 'dra ba de dang de nyid kyi tshig ge mtshams las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ngo / / 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni
43a8: bdag po med pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste// de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
43b1: chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rjod par byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ther zug du gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par
43b2: 'jog par byed do/ / btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshas thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste// de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'god par byed do// btsun pa shar dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang snyoms pa te/
43b3: de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chang bar byed do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang mgrangs/ gang du 'di ma khrid pa ste/ de dag ni bsags pa yang ma yin/ spungs pa yang ma yin no// de dag na
43b4: bshad kyang rung ma bshad kyang rung ste/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid de mi 'dor ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi ge/
43b5: de dag thams cad ni/ lus las kyang ma byung / sems las kyang ma byung ste/ rgyu dang rkyen nyid las byung ba yin no// ji ltar yi ge rnams la sogs pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnams
43b6: layang bstsags pa med do/ / ji ltar sems dang / sems las byung ba'i chos rnamal bsags pa med pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la yang bstsags pa med do// ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmi
43b7: pa thams cad la bstsags pa med pa de bzhin du/ shes pa gang gis nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i shes pa des la yang bsags pa med de// btsun pa sha dwa ti'i bu gang mi gnas pa'i shes pas/ mi gnas pa'i nyon
43b8: mongs pa rnams spangs pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/ / de nas lnga'i bu ded dpon gyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa gang yin
44a1: 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang / phung po yongs su spang ba la yongs su skyob med pa'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa
44a2: yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / ba shes pad 'byung ba shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa rnam par gcad pashes pa dang / rku shes pa dang / chud mi za ba shes pa dang / 'bras bu shes
44a3: ba dang / mngon sum du bya ba spang pa shes pa dang / rkyen shes pa dang / tshogs bstsags pa shes pa dang / bden pa shes pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
44a4: shes pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang / phung po shes pa dang / phung po'i bdud spang ba shes pa dang / khams shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / skye mched shes pa dang /
44a5: grong stong pa lta bur so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / sbyin pa shes pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa la las mi 'dra ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par
44a6: bya ba shes pa dang / bzod pa shes pa dang / sems can rjes su bsrung ba shes pa dang / brtson 'grus shes pa dang / legs pa'i las bya ba shes pa dang / bsam gtan shes pa dang / bsam gtan las ldog
44a7: pa shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa dang / lta ba yongs su shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang / byams pa shes pa dang / sems can bskyab pa shes pa dang /
44a8: snying rje shes pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang / dga' ba shes pa dang / chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la/ mchog tu dga' ba shes pa dang / btang snyoms shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub
44b1: shes pa dang / sems can gzhug pa shes pa dang / tha snyad shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang / gnas med pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba shes pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang /
44b2: 'gal ba shes pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa shes pa dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang stobs shes pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang
44b3: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mi brjed pa shes pa dang / ting nge
44b4: 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / stobs shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa
44b5: shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang / rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang / snying rje chen po la
44b6: lhag par dmigs pa shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang / skye ba med pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran
44b7: bshes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa shes pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba shes pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / byer me ldog
44b8: pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du ba shes pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa
45a1: dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa shes pa dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar shes pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang / rim pa rjes su rtog sa
45a2: shes pa dang / thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang / tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang / sman pa thams cad shes pa dang / rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma
45a3: yin pa shes pa dang / gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang / stobs bcu shes pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang / rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / mi 'jigs pa shes pa dang / bar du
45a4: gcod pa dag bar du gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mthogs pa'i
45a5: shes pa dang / chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da' ba'i shes pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang / gnas pa med pa dang / rab du gnas pa med pa shes pa dang / lus sngon du 'gro ba shes
45a6: pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus kyilas 'jug pa shes pa dang / dag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye pa shes pa dang / yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang / sems can thams cad
45a7: kye sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /
45a8: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang / mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang / dgongs par btu 'dzin pa
45b1: da / sems can le lo tsan yongs su gzung ba shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can gdul ba'i rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang / thabs shes pa dang / shes rab shes pa ste/
45b2: lha'i brede byang chub sems dpa'i gas pa yin// shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na/ sangs rgyas kyi seshes chags pa med pa cog go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa la ji ladu/ byang chub sa
45b3: rapa rnams kyi shes pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni dmar to// shes pa den go ma ni don dang ldan pas/ yang dag par bsdubar gyi
45b4: nus so/ / 'jas dpal ga cig pu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no// 'phags pa tsho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
45b5: bam po gsum pa// // 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang
45b6: bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
45b7: zhes bya/ smras pa lha'i bu/ byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug pas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir/ sems dpa' chen po zhes bya// smras pa lha'i
45b8: bu brtsam pa chen po nyams 'og du chud par byed pa dang / ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/ smras pa lha'i bu shes
46a1: rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang / thabs kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pas/ de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o// smras pa 'jam dpal kyi phyir/ sems can
46a2: dag pa zhes bya ba/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom par yang byed pas/ de'i phyir sems
46a3: can dag pa zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir/ sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnam par spyod par byed pas/ de'i phyir
46a4: sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya// smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar lam de la gnas nas/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pas
46a5: de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams/ shin tu 'dul ba la rab tu bkod par byed pas/ de'i phyir rnams par 'dren
46a6: zhes bya'o/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu ci tsam gyis bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sred pa len
46a7: par byed pa tsam gyisan/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thal bar dka' ba yin/ spras pa/ lta ba 'ad ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang / sngon
46a8: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par ma byed pa de la bun thal bar dka' ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
46b1: mngon par 'phags pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyis/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ kun tu snang ba de tsam
46b2: gyes na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin// smras pa lha'i bu/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig gi
46b3: sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smrab zil gyis gnon par byed pa de lta bu ni chos smra bar byed pa'o/ / smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ 'dul ba smra ba yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas
46b4: la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang / glan nas ldang bar rnam parabasal ba'i phyir/ chos son par byed pa de la bu ni/ 'dul ba smra ba yin no// smras pa'ajam dpal ji ltar na don smra ba yin/ smras pa l+h+wal
46b5: gang gi tshe/ thos pa thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing / don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu don smra ba yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi
46b6: phun sum tshogs pa yin/ / smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la ston par byed pa de lta bu ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum
46b7: tshogs pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' drang po yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
46b8: chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gya gyu can rnams la/ khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin no// smras pa 'jam
47a1: dpal ji ltar na/ g.yo med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ ci skad smras pa'i tshig las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni g.yo med pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ sgyu med pa yin/ smras pa
47a2: lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ ji ltar sems kyis mngon par bsgrub pa de bzhin du tshig tu brjod pa de lta bu ni sgyu med pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ nga rgyal med pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ sems
47a3: can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing / mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni nga rgyal med pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa dag yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe yongs su
47a4: bsdud pa'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na/ dngos po gzhan dag lta spos kyang ci dgos pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ spras pa/ lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal ba mthong na
47a5: srog gi phyir yang byangs kyi sems mi gtong ba yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ bzod pa smra ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ gnod pa bzod cing / gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/
47a6: 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa lha'i bu gang rnam par bsams na/ chos 'gal yang mi dmigs pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ bsam gtan la/ bsam
47a7: gtan pa yin no/ / smras pa/ lha'i bu gar 'dod pa'i khams su phyis mi snang ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ shes rab dang / ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang shes rab kyis bya ba byin par mi byed pa
47a8: yan no/ / spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byams pa la gnas pa yin smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du rnam par lta ba yin no// spras pa/ lha'i bu'ajam dpa' ji ltar na/
47b1: rjel gnas pa na/ tham pa/ kwa'i thug mas bams cadamam 'a grung shes nas/ rgyang na sa na 'grus pa dpa // rnamag 'a da nga// sa shA du
47b2: yin smras pa/ lha'i bu gang ge tshe thob cir zhi la rab du zhi ba thob cing / chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bas mi ngoms pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ smras pa/
47b3: 'i bu sems can yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir 'jig rtenan spyod kyang / 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin // smras pa/ 'jam dpal des na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su dag pa yin/
47b4: smras pa/ lha'i bug gi tshe/ yid las byung ba'i las kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi lus 'thun par ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta na/ rag yongs su dag pa yin// sram pa lha'i bu gang gi
47b5: tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas/ 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ sems yongs su dag pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems gcig gis/
47b6: sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ g+ha'i bu gang gi tshe gzugasnang ba thams cad kyang mthong la
47b7: gzugs dben par yang snyan pa yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ lha'i bu sgra thos pa yin/ smras pa/ skra'i bu gang gi tshe sgra thams cad thos la/ sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal
47b8: ji ltar na/ pha rol gyi sems la mkhas pa yin// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur pa rnams kyi/ sems kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ sngon gyi
48a1: gnas la mkhas pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ sngon gyi mtha'i mu rjes su dran zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba
48a2: shes pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang / ston la bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ dul ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ ma dul ba
48a3: rnams 'dul ba yin no/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na bsrungs pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ rnam par dul ba yin/ smras pa/
48a4: lha'i bu gang gi tshe/ mi 'khrugs pa'i chos su gyur pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na zhi ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad kyis gdung ba med la/ sems can thams cad
48a5: kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston pa yin no/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ dad pa yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs kyis phye yang mi byed pa yin no// smras pa/ 'jam dpal
48a6: ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin// smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la/ byang chub kyi rag las par mthong ba yin no// bskrun pa 'di bshad pa/
48a7: na/ srog chags khri nyi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyan mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal
48a8: gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so// legs so// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi med bshad pa de dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par smras
