235a4: @##rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a sho ka dad ta thA ka ra Ne na ma ma hA yAn su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa mya ngan mad kyis byan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba thegs chen po'i mdo// ba mapo ga cigapa/ sangs rgyas
235a5: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
235a6: dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad dang / gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mngon par shes pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa
235a7: mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa/ mi dmigs pa'i chos la gnas pa/ mi gnas par chos ston pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang /
235a8: byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag kyang dang
235b1: byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'jun shing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems
235b2: dpa' rtag tu gdung dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen thogra dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen pa/ ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur ba dang /
235b3: byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jas dpal gzhon nu gyur pa dang / skyes bu dam pa brgyad la
235b4: 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' phrag sras dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i
235b5: lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo mos kyad pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang / de la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang / thabs gcig du bcug so//
235b6: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing / bzhugs pa la rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang / blon po dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa dang // zhar blon gyi bu tsha dang
235b7: nabs drang na 'khod pa dang / po brang 'khor gyi mi dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis/ gi snang du byas/ tha mar byas/ mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ de na bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong dums
235b8: yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
236a1: yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ rab tu ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan parab 'byor/
236a2: dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang mo dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra can 'dzin dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gam
236a3: pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams/ snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang / sham thabs bgos nas/ lhung zed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhug s+ho/
236a4: de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing / mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la der dong ste/ lhags nas phyogs gcig du cang mi smra bar 'khod
236a5: yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang na/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba/ gzungs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang pos rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan
236a6: pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyer bkur byas pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de/ rang gi pha'i khang bzangs na/ khrig ser
236a7: da pa can yod pa la 'dug par 'gyur to/ / de nas bu mo myo na med kyis byan pas// nyan thos chen po de dag mthong na/ thaMdi las ma langs te/ bsrung sa kyi'agro// b+hag kyang mi byed/ gtam yang ma rnam/
236a8: stan yang mi 'dings/ bsod snyoms kyang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs shes thos nas/ rang gi khang bzangs kyi snga khang/
236b1: ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag la/ mchog du sdug par 'dzin pas mngon par dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ nyan thos chen po//
236b2: de dag mthong bzhin du/ kha rog ste 'dug pa mthong nas/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ma
236b3: rgyas shag kya thub pa da'i nyan thos chen po ste/ nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa// zag pa za pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khung por ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid bkun tu sto
236b4: ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ snying rje ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying rtse ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar khyod kyis mi shes sam can/
236b5: khyod kyis de dag mthong la/ mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang / bsu bar yang mi byed/ phyag kyang mi 'tshal/ gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/ dang pa dang gus pa yang mi snyed par/
236b6: phyir ma gus pa ston cing kha rog ste 'dug/ khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong // de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi za rgyal po ma skyes dgral 'did ces smras so// yab 'di
236b7: snyam du dgongs/ / ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po/ rgyal 'phran la ldang ba'am/ bsung mchi ba nam yang gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/
236b8: yab ci'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dgal ldang ba sa/ bsu 'chi'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab tsa mo mdzod kyi bdag bcangs pa/ lhagazhan dgal ldang dam/
237a1: bkrar 'chi'am// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo ni ma yin no// thams smras pa/ yab ci rgyal po chen po/ mtsho dang / mdze dang / chu mig dang / mtsho thon dang / steng ka dang / thon pa la phyag
237a2: 'tshal ba bsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri'i rgyal po ri rab/ ri na ga po gzhan dag la 'dud pa'am/ phyag 'tshal bags nata ma/ gzigs sa ma
237a3: rgyal pos smras pa/ brom de ni ma yin no// bromos spras pa/ mas kyi nyim dang zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs/ srin bu me khyed gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam// rgyal pos smras pa/ bum
237a4: den ma yin no/ / bu mos smras pa/ yab ci ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge/ wal ldang ba'am/ sung ma chibags na tam gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa/ 5
237a5: bzhin dus zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra sbags la/ dman pa la mos pa'i nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa/ byams pa
237a6: chen po dang / snying rje che chen po dang bral ba dag la dag 'a ding ldang ba'am/ bskur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ bskur sti bgyid/ yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig/ chos kyi 'khor lo blan med pa bskor tam/
237a7: bskor bar bgyid pan/ nyan thos sman pa/ zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi tshe ba'i ye shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la/ dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba'am/ 'dud pa bgyid/ yab lha'i bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu sa zhig/
237a8: rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am/ ldang ba'am/ bsur mchi bar bgyid// yab mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa
237b1: lta busu zhig/ 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i slo gan med pa don du gnyar ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la/ 'dod pa 'am ldang ba'am/ bsar mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/
237b2: yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa mi snyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa tshol ba na/ ba lang gi dmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la/ 'dod pa 'am ldang /
237b3: ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba'am/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid// yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lta bu'i
237b4: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la/ ldang ba 'am/ bsur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba'am/ 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba nyid
237b5: shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / yon tan nyi ma dang / zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thos nas/ srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu'i rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan
237b6: thos dag gis rnam par grol ba la/ 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/ de ci'i slad du zhe na
237b7: su zhig za ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste/ srin bu me khyer la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yab gang nyan thos la sten pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la stan na/
237b8: thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang / gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du
238a1: mi ldang zhing / bsung mi 'gro la/ drug pa 'tshal zhing bsnyen bskur mi byed de/ 'di dag stan dang / bsod snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni/ bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhigag/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
238a2: bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab khyod nyi grong khyer gyi dbul po nams la ma bzhengs/
238a3: bkur mi bzung / bstan mi 'di ba la san/ khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can lags pa snyam bgyid do// rgyal bas smras pa/ bu mo de dag ni dang mchungs pa ma yin no// bu mas smras pa/ yab de bzhin du byang chubasas
238a4: dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags s+ho// rgyal pos smras pa// bumo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te/ sem+ba can thams cad la 'dud
238a5: cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/ / bu mos smras pa/ yang byang chub sems dpa' ni khon du 'dzin pa dang / thab dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/
238a6: sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ni/ khon du 'dzin pa dang / thab dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / nyes pa gsal bar bgyi ba ma mchis/ spang bar bgyi ba dang /
238a7: dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/ yab nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bru gyi nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / shes rab ji snyed pas chos snyan du lags kyang / yang de dag lani
238a8: tshul khrims kyang gang las 'chi/ ting nge 'dzin kyang galas mchi/ shes rab kyang ga/ las mchi/ rnam par grol ba yang gal mchi/ rnam par grol ba'i lags gzigs pa yang ga las mchi// yang 'di lta ste dper na/
238b1: bram pa ba kyis bsnyam pa'i nang nga char 'ban/ dachab kya thags pa gcig kyang mi lan la/ dang gnas par yang mi gyung// mabang bzhin dunyan thos rnams gang te sangs rgyas bu rgyas chos bshang du lags kyang / radag nga
238b2: 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la/ tshul khrims dang / ti nga 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i lags yong ba dang // de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing // rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur
238b3: ro/ / ba 'di lta sna dbang na/ rgya mtshachen po ni chung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing / deng gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slang duzha na/ rgya mtshatshan pa na chad ma mchis pa'i slang du'o// yang byang chubs sa/
238b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos bstan pa'i cha thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so// de ci'i slang du zhe na// de ltar byang chub sems dpa sam
238b5: dpa' chen po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi gnod de ni mi snyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa ni// mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid
238b6: brtan/ nyan thos lnga rgya dag ni lcags gyur kyang // de la sdug d+ha'i phyir ni dam langs// ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni// bu ma do nang las sa kyis// khyod kyis nyan thos lngab rgya mdzo
238b7: bzhin du/ / phyag bya'i phyir ni ci phyir ldang mi byed// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin nar// nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na// ci phyir phyag 'tshal ba'i bsam pa mi skye ba// bdag mchis yab ceg cig ni
238b8: gsan par gsol/ / dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas yang // rin chen 'byung khung nas ni 'ching bu blangs// de bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang // ye shes dbyings nas
239a1: nyan thos grangs snyam bgyid/ / dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po// sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/ dka sha pa ni gcig tsam gsol na ni// de yis rgyal
239a2: sten pa don ma mchis/ / gang gis 'khor los skur ba mnyes bgyis nas// bye ba phrag song gsol ba bgyis na ni// des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid// des ni rgyal po legs par
239a3: bsnyen pa legs/ / kAr sha pa ni spong ba'i mi bzhin du// gang zhig sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams// thos nas theg pa 'dod la sman skyed pa// nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid/
239a4: nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta ba// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste// rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing // byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dper na na pa na/
239a5: brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis// grol bgyi de bzhin gzhan gyi dgra phyir 'brang ba yi// nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid/
239a6: sems can yang ba krol bgyid sman pa bsod nas ni// sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid// de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na// sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud
239a7: par bgyid/ / de ltar nang ba sos par gyur pa thams cad la// sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur pa la// sangs rgyas sman ba dag gis gas
239a8: par mi spyod do/ / 'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la// gso' bar sems kyis sems can gzhan la ma lags ste// de 'dra'i bdag nyid 'gengs par bgyid pa'i ngargyal gyis/
239b1: sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed/ sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas dag nyid ji lta bar/ de bzhin pa rol rnams kyang na
239b2: las grol bgyid pa/ / de ni mchod par 'os shing sngags par bgyi ba dang // 'jig rten kun gyis gdud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang legs//
239b3: gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/ bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags/ de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar
239b4: bgyid pa dang / mkhas pa dag gis mchod par bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags/ gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/
239b5: sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa/ de dag byang chub mchog la mdun pa bskyed pa ste/ de ni 'jig rten kun gyis
239b6: bsngags par bgyi ba lags/ e ra na da'i shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la/ de dag rnams kyi grib pa'ang yangs pa ma lags s+ho//
239b7: e na da'i di'i shing 'dranyan thos thams cad kyis/ rnam par grol ba'i grib mnye bar rten ma lags/ can dan mchog gi sdong chen dag
239b8: tshab yis/ gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyis nye bar bsten pa lags de bzhin padag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang/
240a1: ga na na dan pasag ga na pangasam la/ @ sa pan
240a2: gang ga'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong / tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi/ ba lang dmig rjes chu 'dri'i nyan thos kun/
240a3: sems can kun gyi tsha bzhi mi bgyid/ gang ga'i klung 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid/
240a4: ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa na/ dbul po dag ni 'gron bu len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mangs de dag blangs na ni/
240a5: sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid// de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs// nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin
240a6: chen las/ / chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don slang mang du len par bgyid//
240a7: ji ltar sems na can ra / cung du mchi sa nas gser gyi mdog du 'gyur/ rab gzhan la sems can rnams mchis/
240a8: gser gyi kha dog can du yod mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin/
240b1: na gas kun na sa na smra
240b2: yab cig ji ltar rtswa zan rtse mo yi/ / zil ba'i thigs pas lo rtog rgyas mi bgyid// rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di//
240b3: tshim par bgyid cing le rtog 'phel bar bgyid/ nyan thos thams cad zil ba'i thigs pa bzhin/ byang chub sems dpa'
240b4: rab khams srin dang 'dra/ snying rje mngon byas gang dag rten na ni/ stang gsum de ma chos chu yis tshim par bgyid/
240b5: xxx/ xxx
240b6: pa gto/ sa/ rar / dgags pas da 'a 'gyur//
240b7: rgya chub sems dpa'al/ rtswa da marnams ga' par 'gyur/ gcig du pa de la ma / gshegs pas
240b8: la 'a padzad/ mam pag ga zum pan// bya chu mas da gas// na/
241a1: swa ba kun la stsol ba gying kun 'gron pazhan// sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni 'gron dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' kun la 'gron bgyid bzhin// gzings las nyan pas chub tshon pa las// gzhan
241a2: dag bsgral bar rus par mi 'gyur gyi/ / brtan bgyis gru'i nang du zhugs na ni// sems can bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid// nyan thos gzings la brten pa lta bu ste// sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus/
241a3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur thugs byang chub sems// sdug bsngal mtsholas sem can stsol bar bgyid// ji ltar gsul dor bong bun nan ni// dgralas rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi// blang chen tang shing rten //
241a4: gsul du lhags pa'i dgra nams choms par nus// nyan thos rnams na bong bu non pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen non 'dra ste// sems can kun la pan dang bde skad du// de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kya
241a5: 'ams/ / ji la ba snang gangams rgyas byur kyang // de dag gis nim tshan mo mdzes mi gyur// tha ba tu rgyas pa'i gang sa ni// sa rnams pa'al thig le bzhin dums// mchig tan pos 'di ga
241a6: ma'angadra/ / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sngan slad du// ye shes shar ba skye bo snang bar bgyid// rab cig srin bu ma khyer tshogs 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi/
241a7: 'jam gleng 'din nyi ma'i bong rnams kyis// bya ba sna tshogs rgya dag bgyid par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag srin bu ma khyer 'dra// de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'byung // sangs rgyas rnam gro sa nyim lta bu'i//
241a8: shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grol// yab cig wabargya dag gi skad phyung yang // rig dgas tshogs rnams 'grog par mi 'gyur gyi// seng go'i skad kyis glang chen ri dgas dang // byar bcas rnams kyang
241b1: phyogs su'abyur bar 'gyur/ / yab cig da ltar nyan thos la 'drar gzigs// nga dag zad ces bdud rnams srog mi 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa'i skyong sna bas// bdud dang de bzhin pasu rig
241b2: bsgrag par 'gyur/ / yab gcig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na// theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod mi skyed// su zhig sa med byang chub spangs nas ni// theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/ gang zhig byang chub
241b3: dam pa yongs spangs nas/ / theg pa dmanal 'dod pa paskyed par bgyid// de dag mchod na rnyed pa thob mgyur// de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchis// gang dag ltar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du/
241b4: byang chub mchog la mdun bskyed par bgyid// de dag legs mtsho rnyed pa lags par rnyed// de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // 'jig rten sman slad las bgyid/
241b5: yid kyang rton// gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slang brtson// de dag u dum 'bar ba'i me tog bzhin// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas/
241b6: cang mi smra bar gyur te// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems ste// kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na/ ci bzod pa thob bam/ ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar des so snyam mo//
241b7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// ci'i bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/ spras pa ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la
241b8: yang dag par bzhugs sam/ smras pa ma yin no// bu mo khyod cizhig don du gnyer na/ 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra spogs par byed// bu mos smras pa/ san pa sha ri'i bri/ gal te yang dag chos pag ga da du gnya
242a1: na ni/ bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang mi sgrogs bzhin na/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don du mi gnyer te// de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// btsun pa ga ri'i bu yang gang
242a2: 'di skad du/ bu 'o'od nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu chos gang mngon du byas pa'i/ chos de la ni ci nyan thos shes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba'am/ yang dag par rdzogs
242a3: pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par gzhag pa yod dam/ / gnas brtan sha ri'i bus smras pa// bu mo de dag pa/ ni theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de// chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o//
242a4: bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de lan don du gnyer ba ci yang med do// gnas brtan sha ri'i bus/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis
242a5: byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang /
242a6: dben pa nyid la bye brag ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ci yod// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du
242a7: dbye ba ci yang med de bzhin du/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing / tha dad du dbye ba ci yang medado// btsun pa ga ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' dang
242a8: bla gab med pa la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/ / btsun pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing / tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do//
242b1: gnas brtan gara' bcangs spa bar gyur to// danas ca dang ldan pa mdza dgal gya bcan pas/ bras mya nganam kyis byin pa la 'das daces smras so// ruba'i khyod de gad ces par b.las na/ sangs rgya
242b2: nam sanashi ces lag pa ban du tho la/ nyan thos kyi rnams shi du dpan par thong can/ khyod tan mas can pa rnams sathad ldang bar yang babyed/ phyag kyang ma la/ @
242b3: gtam yang mi zer/ stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan 'dren par mi byed// de skad ces spras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa ma
242b4: dgal gyi bu chen po song gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/ mo 'u dgal gyi bu chen pos spras pa/ bu mo snyoms pa zhugs na ni/ kho bos grangs
242b5: shes kyi snyoms par ma zhugs na ni mi shes so/ / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ lan cig snyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
242b6: gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang rab tu mkhyen na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtos
242b7: pa'i sems can gyi lta ci smos ste/ / btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
242b8: chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod 'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ so'u dgal gyi bus smras ga bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dag la gyi
243a1: 'a chen po/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ mabyon pa ni rdo snyed gcig yod/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bum
243a2: deni migs so/ / bu pos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bre chen po sems cad 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed gcig yod/ zhe sdang la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod gti mug la spyod pa ni ji snyed gcig yod/
243a3: chamanyam pa la spyod pa ni je snyed cig yod/ shesasam/ mo' dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo 'dagal gyi bu chen pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can na ji snyed cig yod//
243a4: rangs brgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa ni ji snyed gcig yod shes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bus sbas pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po
243a5: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can na ji snyed gcig yod/ / rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod// sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod// shes sam/ ma
243a6: dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal kyi bu chen po/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed gcig yod/ log pa nyid du ngas pa'i sems can ni je snyed cig yod/
243a7: ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ shes sam/ mo'i dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni de dag dang / gzhan yang
243a8: de'i go dang gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta ji smos ste/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po/ 'din de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no//
243b1: btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang / de bzhin gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog du bstan gyis/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po// 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na/ de bzhin
243b2: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer da ltar bzhugs ste/ mtsho nang bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang bston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
243b3: de na/ shing ljon pa thams cad las tsan dar sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song shig/ gnas gartan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs
243b4: rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang kho bos de gdod thos na/ sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos gnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/ de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khi de las ma langs bzhin du/ tshig 'di skad ces spras te/ bden
243b5: pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ de bzhin
243b6: gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer des/ bdag nyid dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig/ tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gis tshor bar gyur cig/
243b7: ces byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig 'dis deces smas mthag du bden pa'i byin kyi rlabs des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis/ de nyid kyi tshe 'od
243b8: gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer de chos ston cing bzhugs par mthong bar
244a1: 'gyur ba de la bu'i 'od su las bsgre'o/ / chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so// tsan dan sbal gyi snying po'i drings kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams
244a2: mi mdzod 'di khyab par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer des kyang / gsung gi yan lag drug bcu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin
244a3: pas/ ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa sems dang po bskyed ma thag du// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
244a4: po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po ri ri la gnas pas/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshar nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'dig las zung lags/
244a5: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa thu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis/ nyan thos chen po rnams kyis mdun du seng ge'i
244a6: smra bsgrags te/ des nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
244a7: dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i can dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'dis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan med
244a8: kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang / nan
244b1: par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam thos na/ nyan thos dman pa zhan pa/ zhum pa/ nyi rtse ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba 'am/ bsur 'gro ba 'am/ phyag
244b2: 'tshal bar byed/ / btsun pa mo'u 'gol gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ji tsam du thag ring bshes sam/ mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni mi shes so// bu mos smras pa
244b3: btsun pa po'u dgal gyi blo chen po/ gal te khyod 'ag ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper nA/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal las/
244b4: 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'bras sa lu'i zhing bzhin du/ mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bskal par brtsis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de/ sangs
244b5: rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis 'odar dag mi snang bar/
244b6: mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrungs chen pos/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de
244b7: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de mngon mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/ de ba'an
244b8: gshegs pas gang dag la gzugs su mthong / / gang dag la sgrar shes pa// log par spong bzhugs pa de/ skye bo de dag nga mi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta// 'dren pa rnam
245a1: na chos kyi sku/ / chos nyid shes par bya min pas// des ni rnam par shes mi nus// shes ma gsungs sam// btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po gzhan yang / bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
245a2: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa mngon mthong dam zhes de skad zer ba ni/ / btsun pa 'od bsrung chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i mig gis ma yin te/ gzugs
245a3: su ma yin no/ / lnga'i mig gis ma yin te/ tshor bar ma yin no// shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du shes su ma yin no// chos kyi mig gis ma yin te/ 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te/
245a4: rnam par shes par ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od bsrung chen po gzhan yang /
245a5: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa// bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang / srid pa la sred pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin
245a6: pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no/ / chos gang med pa de ni blta ba mi nus so// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar mi nus so//
245a7: 'od bsrungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/ bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod
245a8: dam/ 'od bsrungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni so so skye bo'i chos rnams la yang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta la ci smos bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrungs
245b1: chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/ 'on ta med pa yin/ 'od bsrungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrung
245b2: chen po de bas na/ chos thams cad ni med pa nyid do// med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par spyad par bya ba med do// btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par
245b3: sbyang bar 'dod pas ni ga lta ba la rnam par bskyang bar bya'o/ / 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po gang gis tshe bdag rang
245b4: bzhin med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na/ de tsam gyis ni bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'od bsrungs chen pos smras pa// bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/
245b5: bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ bdag dben pa yang yin no// rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben no// rang bzhin med pa
245b6: des chos thams cad dben no/ / 'od bsrungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis su la chos thos na/ 'di ltar khyod kyis yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur// bu mo yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis
245b7: dang / rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo // zhes de skad gsungs so// bu mos smras pa btsun pa 'od bsrung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dri de mi 'jog pa'i shes
245b8: rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa las/ lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po gang dag gzhan gyi de dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra
246a1: ma 'tshal la/ / btsun pa 'ad bsrungs chen pa rdo la na dag slang tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od bsrungs chen pos smras pa/ bram gang gi ma ga slong des/ dathos pa chos rnams pa don la nga /
246a2: rtog par byed pa de ltar na/ dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos spras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin// bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa'o/
246a3: srung chen po gang gi tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang lhan cig gnas kyang sems can du 'dra shes bskyed par mi byed pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// btsun
246a4: pa 'od bsrung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid
246a5: dang ldan no zhes/ btsun pa 'od bsrungs chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od bsrung chen pos smras pa/
246a6: bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang med/ mi sbyor ba yang med par mthong ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// 'od
246a7: srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthong na/ chos thams cad mthong ba yin/ bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa 'od bsrung chen po chos thams cad la gnyis su med par mthong la/ mi byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na
246a8: de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin/ / btsun pa 'od bsrung chen po mthong zhes bya ba de ni/ mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 'od bsrungs chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag ji ltar lta bar bya// bu mos
246b1: smras pa/ btsun pa 'ang srung can pas ji ltar mthar ba bzhin du lta bar byar// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bum kha bas ni bdag dang bdag gim mthang // brams smras pa// btsun pa 'od bsrung can/
246b2: po ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o// gtam de skad brjod pa'i skabs su/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
246b3: bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di 'dra brnye maud kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa// btsun pa rab 'byor snyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa
246b4: sobs pa dang ldan zhing / gang gi nad dam phyi rol ci yang mi dmigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo gang ma rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang gis
246b5: bdag ma rnyed cing / gzhan ma yin/ dge ba ma yin/ mi dge ba ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/ zag pa med pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma
246b6: 'dus mabyas ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed la/ so so'i skye bo'i chos
246b7: mi dmigs shing / 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mi dmigs na/ btsun pa rab 'byor de/ na gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras
246b8: pa/ ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma snyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa
247a1: med pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de/ ca brjod cing slar rung ngam/ nyon mongs pa med pa de dang / chos kya de bzhin nyid de la ci spobs pa ci yang yod dam
247a2: rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa 'am brjod par mi nus so// bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na/ khyod kyis bu mo khyod
247a3: spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni/ khyod kyis snyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod ni de ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston to// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor
247a4: chos thams cad la brag cha lta bur mos sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo mos so// bu mos smras pa/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag ca la spobs pa ci yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo de ni med
247a5: de/ bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang
247a6: brten nas byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos thams cad ni brten nas 'byung ba'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma
247a7: skyes pa'o/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ thu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs
247a8: po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ongs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni de ltar bzhugs so// zhes ci'i phyir bstan/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye ba ni skye bar mi
247b1: 'gyur ro/ daci bya she na// btsun par 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni skye ba'amanub par 'gyur ba mi 'dod pa byar ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bum khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dmapa'i tshegason to/
247b2: bu mos smras pa/ btsun parab 'byor bsnyen pa thams cad ni bstan du med pa'o// de ci'i byar bstan pa thams cad bstan du med cen/ de ni bstan kyang ngam bstan kyang rung / dngos po ma yin te/ dngos pa med pa dang /
247b3: drimed pa'i mtha' ma spong ba'i byed ro// rab byor gyis smras pa/ bum byed khyim na gnas bzhin du/ 'di sa bu'i chos la gnas snang / 'dus pa'i rnam padag/ smon pa 'dun ra to// bsgos pas pa/
247b4: parab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba zhes bzung bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni bsam pas phye ba yin/ shes rab kyis bye ba yin/ ye shes kyis
247b5: bye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ / btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis god cig dang / khobs nyan to// bu mos smras pa/ bdun/
247b6: parab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldanan/ khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dag gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad ga she na/ 'di lta ste/ btsu
247b7: pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ / lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro// sems can thams cad
247b8: yongs su mi stong par gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no/ / 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang / spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang yin no// lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir//
248a1: gabatang snyoms gnas pa yang yin no// yongs su brdzob la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyi thabs la mkhas pa yang yinan// la ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'is
248a2: nges par 'byung ba yang yin no/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin no// bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma bstan pa shes pa yang yin te// btsun pa
248a3: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/ spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du/ kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro//
248a4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgragacan zin gyis/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyo mal khri gser gyi rkang pa can la 'dug cing stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas/ nyan thos chen po dag dang /
248a5: gtam ma pa dru ma yin pa nas pa'i // bu mo min par bstan mthon po la 'jug pa la/ stan dpa' ba la 'dug pas chos bshad par mibya'o// zhes bya gyi khyod kyis mthos sam/ de gad ces smras pa dang / bum
248a6: ngan med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgrag can zin la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa skrag can zin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/ 'jig rten na gang dag ni mi rung ba yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/ sngag can
248a7: zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo khe bos shes te/ gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob cing / bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o// gang dag bsgrub pa de las 'gal bar byed pa de dag ni
248a8: rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ / bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa// btsun pa ga can ban thod de ga/ da mazer cig/ btsun pa zlan can zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la bslob pa de dag ni rung bam
248b1: yin pa'o/ / dacar byur zhe na/ 'di sar dadagan rtog cing rnam par rtog ra// btsun pa/ na zin gang dag sa rtog cang rnam par martog pa de dag na rang bzhes byar// bcan na can du banas
248b2: ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig bla dgas yin te/ de dag ci bslab pa las 'gal ba mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni slab pa las yang dag par 'das pa
248b3: byir te/ de dag ni phyir yang bslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pas/ de dag ni ru ba ma yin no// de dag ni tham sa gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// de dag ni 'a zab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/ mi slob pa zhes byag/
248b4: de de dag gi sgrub pa ni me dmigs te/ khams gsum pa btags pa tsam du shes so// de'i phyir de dag gi rlung bzhes bya'o// thAg can zin gyis smras pa/ bu mo sra ba dang rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad du dbyed
248b5: sa sod/ bums pa/ bzha can di snyed na/ gang das sargyan rgya pa dang / rgyan du byas pa las pa dang bye ba cigag pad// sha mas smras pa/ tha dang
248b6: med do/ / bu mo pa smras pa/ btsun bstag can zin de bzhin du dru ba dang / rung ba bayin pa yang yi ge'i tha skad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ci dang yang
248b7: bral ba'i phyir te/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// btsun bsgrag can zin yang 'di skad du/ stan shin tu thob la 'dug te/ chos nyan tam zhes zer ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rnab ting
248b8: ba la 'dug kyang / shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no// skrag can zin gyis smras pa/ nam grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub ses
249a1: dal ga / rgyu AH8/ a smras/ 'a/ na rgya chag/
249a2: dpa' bcwo ba ting pa la 'dug pa la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ tshangs pa'am/ badz+ra byinA nas/ 'jig rten stong ngam/ de las gzhan pa 'og sa na man chad pa lnga gang yin padang/
249a3: thams cad kyis lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la gtug par byed dam/ skrag can zin gyis spras pa/ bu mo de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no// bu mos spras
249a4: pa/ btsun bklag can zin de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang / dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang / stan shin tu mthon po la 'dug pa yin gyi/ nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
249a5: 'dug pa ni de lha ma yin par rig par bya'o/ / de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo btsun pa sgragacan zin gyis ni// bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub
249a6: pa de nyid kyi sras yin/ / bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin no// ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/ ya bathong shigazong shig/ 'di ltar btsun pa sgrag can zin
249a7: bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de'i sras yin zhes ma gsung shig/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan btags pa lta bu/ wa skyed per 'gyur ba nam yang gsan tam gzigs sam/
249a8: pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// rnga mos sbas pa/ yab de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs pa/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sbyar ba'i zham 'bring ba ni nyan thos mdzes pas
249b1: lags so/ / yab de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang sbran/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin na zhes dadag yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o// yab de lta bas na de bzhin gshes
249b2: pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed par brdzi'o/ / gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs su// rgyal po ma skyes sgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas
249b3: btsun mo nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do/ / lha'i bu rgya tham pos kyang bu mo 'di'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems
249b4: bskyed de/ tshig 'di skad du 'a di rnams 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so// lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu
249b5: mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i matog dag gis mngon par gtor to// de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khri ga ser gyi rkang pa can las
249b6: babs ste/ nyan thos chen po de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / myang bar bya ba gsod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur sti byas te/
249b7: da pa dang gus pas rang gi la gnas nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas/ 'di skad du btsun pa gdang dgur slad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzhud cig/ btsun pa dag bdag kyang 'chi bar 'tshal
249b8: la zhes kyang smras so/ / de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa lam la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang / skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
250a1: gas 29u0f7f/ thugasas na// mal rnams / na na
250a2: 'tshal nas/ gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// nyan thos chen po de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig dra 'khod pa/
250a3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ga ri'i bras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bum mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngamatshar legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
250a4: sha ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don du gnyer ba na/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsab dag bskyed de// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du
250a5: bu po 'dis bu med kyi lus ma sbyar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sha ri'i bri 'di ji snyam du sems// thul mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med da snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o// byang chub sems
250a6: dpa' sems dpa' bdag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ smon lam gyi bdag nyid bud med kyi gzug su ston to// de nas de'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byas te/ bden/
250a7: pa'i byin gyi rlabs ga dgis/ chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa ltan/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang
250a8: mthong bar gyur cig/ tshig de skad ces sus mthag du bud me dkyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur nas/ steng gi bar snang la tal bdun srid tsam du 'phags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
250b1: tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa steng gi bar snad la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthang ngam// sha ra'i bus gsol pa// brtsam/
250b2: ldan 'das mthong legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun gyis/ 'jig rten gyi 'dra
250b3: drim med pa'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan ma pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ / tshe'i tshad ni skal pa brgyar 'gyur// dam pa'i chos ni skal pa bcu
250b4: gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig du 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa gnyis yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams
250b5: de ya be du r+yalas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi sa bkra par byas shing / mig mangs rigs sa bris la/ rin po che'i padams kheb pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi rnams
250b6: longs spyod kyang khyad par med de/ sha ri'i bu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi yang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pal
250b7: rgyal pam smras dgra'i btsun mo dam pa zla ba can zhes bya ba des/ thal mo sbyar ba bajud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag go skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung zla dgur ruman
250b8: bzung ba 'di dag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams
251a1: dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du/ 'di'i 'og du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa sha/
251a2: bral bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu lan mob+ha bcan khyod kyis mthong ngam/ ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkar stsal pa/ 'i bra
251a3: mo'i btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bskal pa snyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing / lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang /
251a4: byams pas byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ rgyal po dung zhes bya ba'i de'i bu/ rgyal po gzhon nu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas ste/ rab tu byung bar 'gyur ro//
251a5: nges de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dam pa'i chos thog ma dang bar ma dang tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang /
251a6: mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro// de la thar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de la
251a7: mchod pa tshad med pa dag byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
251a8: de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu ste/ yid rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul ste/ tshangs par spyod par rgyal pos gnang nas//
251b1: bslab pa gan dag gzung ba// dan byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' can pa mya na ma dbyas byin pas lhas bral pa'am/ gas na dang bdag gas/ com ldan 'das dnga' ba thams cadapa
251b2: 2/ / de nas par snang las babs ste/ blugs gcig na 'dug nas/ tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshigasang gis bdag nasabyang chub zas pa / byang chubasams dpa
251b3: sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad rdzus te skye zhing / chos gos ngur smrig gyon la/ rin po che pad mo dag la skyil mo bkrung bcas te skye bar 'gyur blta na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ dper na dge
251b4: sgor bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgyad lon pa'i spyod lam ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig/ ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas/ bden pa'i/

251b6: ces smras so/ / yab 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bcos ma ste/ rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / yongs su brtags pa las la ngas pa med bzhin du/ phyin ci log dang mtshungs par
251b7: ldan pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzigs shig dang / de ring kho na'i gdugs cig la/ bu mo'i gzugs su yang gzigs/ khye'u'i gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs/ de ni bdag la dge slong gi
251b8: gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs na/ 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs las sam/ rgyal po chen po de ltar na/ ya ma R+Ya'i chos thams cad la/ 'di na kha cig lta ba'i kun nas dkri bas kun nas
252a1: glags ga ngams te/ rang gi rgyud la macas panyan tshangs panams rgyas pangs su dranag/ yongs su bsregs pas ces dul ba 'dim 'chal te/ 'azod pa ma lags par ba/

252a3: pas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po khyod ni bya ba mang zhing / byed pa mang ba legs kyi/ bzhud cig/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang

253a1: rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya bi ma la dad ta pa ri bri tsha nA ma ma hA yan sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bamabod do// sangs rgyas dbyung /
253a2: chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge
253a3: slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol
253a4: pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas
253a5: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag cig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu
253a6: phal cher thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang /
253a7: byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i blo gros dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / byams pa dang / mya ngan med kyis byin dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gom pa
253a8: 'dod bdon yod dang / mthong ba 'don lod dang / ngan song spong dang / mya ngan med kyi mun pa dang / thams cad 'joms pa dang / yon tan rin po che'i me tog gis rtag tu brgyan dang / gser gyi 'breng ba'i 'od dpal can dang / sgrib pa
253b1: thams cad rnam par sal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs pa med pa/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' gri dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo
253b2: 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan par ba 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa na bzla dang / rga pa ga pa ga zhan da 'dod nam chen po da
253b3: po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song srong dang / rin chen tog dang / mthong ba don yod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras
253b4: gzigs dbang phyug dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa 'gos pa 'dor ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi che/ gam thabs dang / chos
253b5: gos bgos nas/ ljang bzed thogs te/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ zong khyer chen po mnyan yod du zhugs nas de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam 'di skad ces/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis 'phags
253b6: pa'i bden pa'i gtam thos par 'gyur pa rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// zhes brjod par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du 'phags pa'i
253b7: bden pa rnams le skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi shes rab thogs pa med de/ de dag gi shes rab la mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par byas
253b8: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs ste/
254a1: zong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa byams pa'i brag dpos smras pa/ cinas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun sa chub dang / gcer zlab dang / 'chob ba dang /
254a2: zam ze dang / khyim bdag gang dag grong byer na 'bod pa de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin pa kho ba snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'dug par
254a3: bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrungs chen pos spras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo gang dag bdag gcag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa
254a4: 'bod pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la thug bar du longs spyod zad mi shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer
254a5: du 'jug par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin pa
254a6: khob snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa nam grus smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba/ rnam
254a7: pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nad med pa'i bde ba
254a8: thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshigs thams cad la/ sngon ma thos pa'i
254b1: chos rnams mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho ba snyoms par zhugs te/ grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ ci nas kyang gang gis grong khyer na/ sgo dang skar 'ung
254b2: dang / cig pa dang / gnod dang / rgyan dang / shing dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu gos rnams las stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / skye ba med pa'i
254b3: sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong gis smras pa// gang gis grong khyer na sems can rnams
254b4: kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod de/ tshe 'di nyid la yang shing chung ngu myod bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer
254b5: na/ sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rin
254b6: tshogagis smras dag byed kyis thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams de lta bu'i thasam pa kho bos bsab par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/
254b7: gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa po zos bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dpang
254b8: byuphyag gis smras pa/ ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang / gang dang mi bde dag thams dacang padang/ 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos pas
255a1: bar bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa// gang gis grong khyer na ste ba'i tshogs thams cad can rgyan du tshigs su ma pa'i nga pa dang / byangs pa'i sems kyis sgrub gyu yang
255a2: stobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rna pa de lta bu'i sems pa kho bos pasam par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'agom pa 'dod bdon yod kyis smras pa/ cinas kyang grong kyi sems can gang dga' ba'i tshig la man sa
255a3: bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/ / de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chubase mas dpa'
255a4: de dag rnam pa de lta bu'i gtam 'di brjod cing mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por phyin to/ / yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsag
255a5: bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la mnyen bkur byas pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga po dag thob pazhig yod de/ bu mo des lha'i mig pa dang mi sa 'das phra/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan
255a6: thos chen pos de dag mthong zhing de dag lam gyi skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang thos so/ / bu mo de yang bzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa dri zhim pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/
255a7: pha ma dang nang mi la byams pa/ btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste// de pying tha tha chungs tshes brgyad dkar ma rgyal gyi nyin par/ phams dge mtshan dang bkra shis bye dadu gnang nas/ bram ze zho dang / tsu ku sha dang / me tog dang
255a8: yam sdeg shing dang / mang dang bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor ba te/ khrus byas par khrid pa dang / tham ze de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa 'de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang /
255b1: bag mi shes ma gam pa'i 'dugs kyis gnas par gyur to// de nas byab ci dag na nas/ zas bcas 'bras tshangs pa'i 'azhes bya ba das/ bu madri ma mad kyis byin pa la 'di sad ces smras pa/
255b2: bu mo dge slong dag mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra mi shis te/ de dag mthong na/ dgos pa 'am/ nor ram/ brtul zhugs sam/ mchod sbyin nam/ bkra shis kyang rung ste/ mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du slar bzhud //
255b3: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// 'di dag chags med mchog tu dge shes pa// skye bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed// 'di dag rnam par dag cing bden
255b4: bzhi mthong / / dul la 'gro bar gyur cing mnyam par gzhag/ 'di dag rkang gnyis dam pa bsod nams zhing // 'di la yon phul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di la yon phul 'bras bu 'chi med 'thob/
255b5: byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// tshul khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin// 'dod las dargal cing sdig med re ba med// 'di dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgyu// sdug bsngal sel ba'i
255b6: srog chags thar par byed/ / sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje// de'i bsras 'di dag brdul med nyon mongs med// 'di dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang med// shes rab ldan mis 'di dag ji ltar spang //
255b7: 'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhi// bkra shis gyur cing mkhas pas sbyin char phab/ 'di dag rnams la bskur ste chung byas kyang // mi rnams chos dang de bzhin nor yang 'grub// 'di dag mtshan
255b8: rnams yongs rdzogs dge bshes ldan/ / 'di dag zhing mcho/ rnam dag sems dang ldan// bram ze 'di la su zhig dang byed pa// de ni bsod nams mang po bskyed par 'gyur// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bu mo
256a1: mam kyas bya/ chags su pa / byas mams kyi sa ma ba/ cad byu sa ga sa gags
256a2: shis/ / ngur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo bregs pa/ de dag don 'dod pas ni lha mi bgyi/ yab dang yum yang dgyes par mi 'brar zhing / bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/
256a3: khyod mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis/ dpas dag slong ma ni shin du grangs/ de nas bu ma drim med kyis byi pas/ bram ze tshangs pa'i skadade la chags su bcad smras/
256a4: yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma rtogs par/ padang ma yang ma mo'i skyabs ma yin/ gnyen gyi tshogs dang nod dang yang tsha min/ 'di dag 'bong bar gying
256a5: rnams kyis skyabs/ bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lus btang zhing / de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang / dkon mchog gsum zhid skyabs yin pa rtogs/
256a6: pad/ kho mo'i skyabs rten sems can 'din med/ de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas/ bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
256a7: bumo btsas nas khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs/ sngon chos kyang mgasan/ sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bsgyud yang ma mdzadan/ khyod ci'i slad du
256a8: sangs rgyas la dad par 'gyur/ bu mo drim med kyis byin pas spras pa/ bram ze lo mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon pan/ tsan dan gyi khang bzangs kyi nang na/
256b1: ngas gas/ 'du sa mas mas sa
256b2: na ma rdzu sa dran mas/ nas du gan nas ga shes pa da gagags pa cang pa ga pa sa sa rnams tha sa
256b3: das ga/ das ma rgya da kya da
256b4: chags su na pa 'di dag smras so/ de'i dbus dri med sngam ni mdzes/ gtsang 'angam g.yas su 'khyim pa'i chur lo con/

257a1: de'i ljags me zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs/ / de'i zhal ni dri med nam par 'dzes// de'i gsung ni phan zhing skad lag
257a2: pa ga/ cig rtsub spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med// skye ba dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing // 'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba gsung yang sgrogs// de'i mgur ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra// de bzhin mi dbang phyug gi sor mo rig
257a3: de'i phyag ni glang chen snga dang 'dra/ / bram yangs dri med lte ba zhol zhing zab// rta mchog lta bur mdoms kyi sbub nub// de bzhin spu'i khur bu gser dang 'dra// brla'i dbyibs ni glang po'i lag dang bachungs//
257a4: zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa e ne'i 'dra// thub pa'i dbang po bden gsungs rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral// ngan lhas bcos pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i lta ba 'jig/ 'khor kyi nang du drib bye ba gris byas kyang // 'khrul/
257a5: ba skyon dang bral bas sems can kun cis mdzad// gya grwa med kyang cig gis lus ni tshib mdzad cing // mya ngan 'das pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag ni// skye bo kun kyi yid 'od mya ngan 'das ston cing // mtha'
257a6: gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston/ / de ni rang gis sangs rgyas gyur pa ste// bdag nyid rgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol// 'gro ba'i skyobs dang skyabs dang dge shis shing // 'jig rten kun la
257a7: thugs ce bdapa mad/ / ston pa de'i yon tan 'di dag dang // gzhan yang mtha' yas kho bos dam brjod// thosan/ lha rnams yid dga' dang gAr dag/ rgyal ba la ni dad pa'i yid kyang rtsub// de nas dum
257a8: drim zed kyis byin pas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze kho mo btsas nas/ zhag bdun lon pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos so//
257b1: mngo/ nate/ de can ca nas yang / thugs pa dang nyid kyis non par mgyur to// nam yang 'dod pa la nas par rtog pa rnam par rtog pa dang // gdo mams kyi dmapar rtag pa'i rnas pa sog pa dang /
257b2: sa ga pa dang / nga na da la sa/ pa dag
257b3: na sa dka' ba'am/ gos la dga' pa'am/ lum la dga' ba'am/ thog sa dga' ba' ba/ grong khyer bdaga' ba'am/ skye me la dag pa ban kyi/ ga na/ yangs rgya nyid dzun
257b4: rdza panano/ / tham nam pa digasams pas ma/ 'di sa byas pa dal / de bzhin gagags pa phyogs gan zugs pa dang / gshegs pas sa ga ga man
257b5: su bzung zhing kho bos don tam cig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang chud ma zos par byas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba 'oms nam yang yid ma byas par 'gyur to// kho bos
257b6: nyid mtshan gang du yang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos pa thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkum byas par ma gyur to// brab ze kho mo ni sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bas rtog pa pod/
257b7: denas tham ze sangs pa'i lhas/ bram ze'i khye'u zhigi la spras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod song la/ lo rgyas 'di rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol cig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rings pa'i tshul du song ste/ ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyas
257b8: thams cad rgyal po dang / btsun po la gsol to// bu mo drim med kyis byin pas kyang / ji ltar brab ze tshangs pa'i lha la phyogs pa/ bram ze ldan po de dag gis/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa chub dus pas bskyed pa de ltar/
258a1: sangs rgyas kyi sngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge 'dun gyi sngags pa brjod do// de nas bu mchem med kyis byin pa/ shing lha las babs nas/ bram ze de dag dang / lhan cig du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dgag
258a2: la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de dag gi rkang pa la go bos phyag 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhesas dang bcas par/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
258a3: smras so/ / sha ri'i bu bu med ni shes rab sor gnyis pa/ nyon mongs pa drag pa/ bag med pa mngab/ dman pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du 'chi ba lags na/ bdag la thugs rtse ba'i nye bar bzung ste/ ci nas bdag gi yun ring bo dind
258a4: sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ btsun par de ltar bdag la chos legs par bstan du gsol// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gtam byung ba 'di dang / bram ze'i tshig thos nas/ myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/ des nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'adi dag
258a5: la phyag byas nas/ rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod na de kho mo nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par mgyur to// nam yang dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed do// zhes zer ba/ de ltar khyod bde ba dang / yid bde ba brtson nam/ 'on te 'di ltar ci
258a6: tshul gyis sma de nas rgyal po gas la rgyal gyi sa rang gi bu mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyi gzugs byad lha'i bu mo mtshungs shing na/ rgyan rnams kyis ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin/ ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyid kyis mnon ga/ ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid 'byung
258a7: 'thung khyod kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin du legs par 'byor/ ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du 'byung ba yin/ bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod / da yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyarna ma chung / sdug cing 'ayangs la yid du 'ong bde/ skye bo kun pa dga' ba skyed yin no// 'on na ba cu drug du
258a8: mas brgyan pa pyod / ci'i phyir na gyim 'di dga' ba med/ bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig thos gyur cing / ce zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde/ yongs su rnams shing yid 'byung sems su 'gyur/ khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'drang la smos/ de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas/ rang gi sa rgyal po gas la rgyal la
258b1: tshogs su bcad desas pa/ yab cig dung po nyis dmigs gnod rnams dang / khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs sum chad dam/ 'khor ba'i gnas ni gang la lha dang mtshungs/ 'tsho ba'i 'jig rte gas 'jig pa can/ thul gdug dang na gnas pa'i byem 'dis/ gzhi dang 'ad pa'i 'dun ga/
258b2: la mchis/ khams 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i sprul bzhi ste/ srid pa sems dpa' bde ba ga la mchis/ mi mdza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing / dgon par phyin la dga' ba ga la mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskor ba/ ji ltar bde 'thob rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/
258b3: dug mthungs pa la bde bag la mchis/ gsang bar bkril dga' ba ga la mchis/ g.yangs che 'dir su zhig yid ston bgyid/ rgyal po mtsho ba'i 'jig rten de dang mtshungs/ blong na dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni/ ri rab tsam gyi phung por gyur to zhes/ de bzhin gshegs
258b4: bas dpe'i ni bka' stsa la na/ 'dus byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton/ pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang / bu dang rtsa lag gnyen tshogs 'gro ba kun/ 'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs brnyen 'dra/ 'di 'dra'i mi sdug gang la su yid rton gang tshe bdag gis rang 'byung rgyal
258b5: ba mthong / de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye/ byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni/ yab cig bdag gis ma thos mthong ngo // bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba blta 'tshal 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras po 'di dag mthong / yab cig
258b6: ji ltar 'dod pa bsten par bgyi/ de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig 'di thos nas cad mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu bo dri ma med kyis byin bla rang gi sa cang mi slu bar thur bang rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gtab du gsol// 'di ltar/
258b7: btsu pa shA ri'i buM ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci shes rab ta 'dus byas lags sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas lags/ dgal te 'dus byas lags na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa
258b8: slu ba'i cho sgra can yin no/ / zhes bka' stsal to// ci ste 'dus ma byas lags na/ 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni bdapa ma mchis na/ phrad pa ma mchis pa'i sha ra gyis ji ltar btsun pa shi'i bu shes pa chen po zhes pagyi/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shrI di'i bu cang ni sma 'gyur to//
259a1: des chod ldan modag kyi phun po na ldan pa shA bu 'dig sa smra lo// shA ri'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ shA ri'i bris smras pa/ bu mo 'di 'dus byas mi 'dra'o/ bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te/
259a2: de la ni lan gdab par mi nus sa// de nas bu mo drim med kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar btsun pa mo lnga 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni/ bcom
259a3: ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci tshe dang ldan pa/ sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul ston tam/ 'on te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te/
259a4: 'phrul ston/ gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na/ sems can ni ma mchis pa ste/ de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ste chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te stan
259a5: na/ chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyub ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na/ rnam par mi rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu
259a6: chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas byams ma'i bu gang dpos/ tshe dang ldan pa mo 'dagal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pi'i lan thob shig/ mo'u dgal gyi bus
259a7: smras pa/ bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi 'dra yi/ bu mos ni 'gyur ba med pas te/ 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yin pas/ de ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas
259a8: bu mo dri mi med kyis byin pas/ byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyis mchog tu bstan pa lags na ci tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas
259b1: la ston tam/ can ted chags pas mtshas pa'achas stan/ gal te dmags pa dang bcas pa 'tshas stananan/ khyod byas pas sa rgya bo rnams dang margyams// dag lung canan/ rgyam thamam na
259b2: ma ni dmigs pa da cas pa'i mad te/ de lta ba na can pa yang byas thams sgru ba thams cad kyi tshas rnams dang sa thal ba lagasas// dgrad migs pa kyi byed na/
259b3: mamatshas par u0f7f/ mi bad do// den dang ldan pa gang po ma cang mi bar byug/ denas tsha ldan pa 'od sung can pas gang pol di na ces smras// gang po rnams na/
259b4: na nga / tham pan rdzom sa// khyim na na dam padus te/ de na ba mas// dam 'amanam med kyi tsa pas/ lda ya na can pal la/
259b5: btsun pa 'od sung chen po ni rnam par thar ba brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te/ gzhan dgal chos ston cing / gang dag las than gzang thag tsam gyi bsod snyoms yongs sa bras pa de dag thams dam mangs sa so
259b6: 'gyur ro/ / zhe na/ de ci btsun pas lus kyis sbyin pa spyod dam/ 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa spyod/ gal te lus kyis spyod na/ lus ni bems po g.yo ba ma mchis pa/ byed pa ma mchis pa ste/ rtswa dang shing dang / tsag ci'i chos /
259b7: ba mig yod dang mtshungs pas des kyang spyod par mi nus so// ji ste sems kyis spyod na/ sems ni sgyum lta bu gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ des kyang spyod par mi nus so// ji ste lus dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis spyod na/ de ni ma mchis
259b8: paste/ ma mchis pas ji ltar spyad par bgyid// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur te// rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po/ bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ 'od srung chen pos
260a1: smras pa/ bu mo ni len pa mi 'dra'i/ bu mos ni len pa med pa dris shing / yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dribs/ de la ni lan gdab par mi nus so// de nas bu mo drim med kyis byin pas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra'o//
260a2: 'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags sam/ 'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu bye ba lags/
260a3: gal te dngos pos rab tu bye ba lags na ni/ 'dus byas su 'gyur ro// ji ste chos nyid kyis rab tu bye ba lags na/ chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/ skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag
260a4: ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do/ / mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// gyung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa don tha skad ma mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis
260a5: pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o// bstan tu ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni ma
260a6: byung ba'o/ / ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams mi ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa/
